component.text: Configuration du routage inter-VLAN de type router-on-a-stick

component.feedback: *** Vous devez saisir la commande précisément et en entier. Les commandes qui incluent un nom ou un mot de passe sont sensibles à la casse.***
component.existingcommands:
Configurez R1 comme suit :
  • Créez la sous-interface .10 sur l'interface g0/0.
  • Configurez l'encapsulation pour le VLAN 10.
  • Affectez l'adresse IP 172.17.10.1/24 à la sous-interface.

command.instruction:
• Créez la sous-interface .30 sur l'interface g0/0.
  • Configurez l'encapsulation pour le VLAN 30.
  • Affectez l'adresse IP 172.17.30.1/24 à la sous-interface.
  • Activez l'interface physique.
  • Revenez au mode d'exécution privilégié.

command.deviceresponse:
R1#
*Mar 20 06:32:03.777: %LINK-3-UPDOWN: Interface GigabitEthernet0/0, changed state to down
*Mar 20 06:32:04.217: %SYS-5-CONFIG_I: Configured from console by console
*Mar 20 06:32:06.929: %LINK-3-UPDOWN: Interface GigabitEthernet0/0, changed state to up
*Mar 20 06:32:07.929: %LINEPROTO-5-UPDOWN: Line protocol on Interface GigabitEthernet0/0, changed state to up
command.instruction: Affichez les informations relatives au VLAN sur R1.

command.deviceresponse:

vLAN Trunk Interface: GigabitEthernet0/0

Protocols Configured: Address: Received: Transmitted:
Other 0 1
0 packets, 0 bytes input
1 packets, 18 bytes output

IP 172.17.10.1 0 0
Other 0 1
0 packets, 0 bytes input
1 packets, 46 bytes output
Virtual LAN ID: 30 (IEEE 802.1Q Encapsulation)

Protocols Configured: Address: Received: Transmitted:
IP 172.17.30.1 0 0

R1#
command.instruction: Affichez la table de routage sur R1.

command.deviceresponse:
Codes: L - local, C - connected, S - static, R - RIP, M - mobile, B - BGP
D - EIGRP, EX - EIGRP external, O - OSPF, IA - OSPF inter area
N1 - OSPF NSSA external type 1, N2 - OSPF NSSA external type 2
E1 - OSPF external type 1, E2 - OSPF external type 2
i - IS-IS, su - IS-IS summary, L1 - IS-IS level-1, L2 - IS-IS level-2
ia - IS-IS inter area, * - candidate default, U - per-user static route
o - ODR, P - periodic downloaded static route, H - NHRP, l - LISP
+ - replicated route, % - next hop override

Gateway of last resort is not set

172.17.0.0/16 is variably subnetted, 4 subnets, 2 masks
C 172.17.10.0/24 is directly connected, GigabitEthernet0/0.10
L 172.17.10.1/32 is directly connected, GigabitEthernet0/0.10
C 172.17.30.0/24 is directly connected, GigabitEthernet0/0.30
L 172.17.30.1/32 is directly connected, GigabitEthernet0/0.30
command.instruction: <font size='10' face="Arial"><b>Vous avez configuré correctement le routage inter-VLAN de type router-on-a-stick.</font>
